member.name: T:vdControls.vdFramedControl
member.summary: This is the main Framed Control that contains a property list, commandline, menu and scroll bars.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.SetLayoutStyle(vdControls.vdFramedControl.LayoutStyle,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Controls the visibility of the various controls of the vdFramedControl.
member.param: An enumerator that specifies which control's visibility will change.
A boolean value representing the visibility of the specified control.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.GetLayoutStyle(vdControls.vdFramedControl.LayoutStyle)
member.summary: Get the visibility of a specified control of the vdFramedControl.
member.param: An enumerator representing the requested control.
member.returns: A boolean value representing the visibility of the control.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.#ctor
member.summary: Main constructor of the vdFramedControl.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.OnLoad(System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Fires when the control is loaded.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.LoadMainMenu
member.summary: Loads the main menu located at the Resources Directory.This directory can be set either using the SetResourcesDirectory method of vdSerialize or it is the directory where the VectorDraw assemblies are.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.ShowMenu(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Controls the visibility of the control's menu.
member.param: A boolean value representing the visibility of the menu.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.UnLoadCommands
member.summary: Unloads the commands that are used in the commandline.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.UnLoadMenu
member.summary: Unloads and clears the menu of the control.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.LoadCommands
member.summary: Load the commands located at the Resources directory.This directory can be set either using the SetResourcesDirectory method of vdSerialize or it is the directory where the VectorDraw assemblies are.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.LoadCommands(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the commands from the specified direcctory and filename.
member.param: The directory where the commands text file is located.
The filename of the commands text file.
member.returns: True if the commands where succesfully loaded.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.LoadCommands(System.IO.StreamReader)
member.summary: Load all commands from an existing System.IO.StreamReader stream.
member.param: The System.IO.StreamReader stream to load the commands from. This can be a project's resources file that is common to the commands.txt that we provide.
member.returns: True if the commands were succesfully loaded.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.LoadMenu(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the specified menu to the control.
member.param: The directory where the menu text file is located.
The filename of the menu text file.

member.name: M:vdControls.vdFramedControl.LoadMenu(System.IO.StreamReader,System.String)
member.summary: Loads the specified menu to the control.
member.param: A System.IO.StreamReader stream to load the menu from. This can be a text file in the resources of the project as the menu.txt that we provide.
The directory where the Images are for the icons of the menu.
